casebody.data:
Howell
v.
N.C. Wayne County Department of Health and Human Services, et al. 326P15-4 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 26, 2017 Burl Anderson Howell, for Howell, Burl Anderson. Michael T. Wood, Special Deputy Attorney General, E.B. Borden Parker, Attorney at Law, for N.C. Wayne County Department of Health and Human Services, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th of October 2016 by Petitioner for Reconsideration:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th of January 2017."
